translations: n．没收，充公：指政府或其他权力机构依法剥夺个人或组织的财产。
· The government ordered the confiscations of illegal assets.
政府下令没收非法资产。

sentences.sentence: To administer the funds of various taxes and fees as well as revenues of confiscations and accounting computation.
sentences.translation: 负责全国海关各项税费资金以及罚没收入的管理和会计核算工作。
